results.summary: A teenager charged with murder after the fatal stabbing of a college student in Birmingham is remanded in custody.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/e33bd1c8-63d9-6c40-9abb-d58d7e4da5d6"><image id="69936256"/><paragraph role="introduction">A teenager charged with the murder of a college student stabbed in Birmingham has been remanded in custody.</paragraph><paragraph>The 17-year-old, charged with murdering 16-year-old Azim Azam, will appear at the city's crown court on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>Azim, from Billesley, was found collapsed in the street after getting off the number two bus in Moseley at 08:30 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>The accused, who cannot be named because of his age, appeared at Birmingham Youth Court.</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/e33bd1c8-63d9-6c40-9abb-d58d7e4da5d6"><paragraph>A teenager charged with the murder of a college student stabbed in Birmingham has been remanded in custody.</paragraph><paragraph>The 17-year-old, charged with murdering 16-year-old Azim Azam, will appear at the city's crown court on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>Azim, from Billesley, was found collapsed in the street after getting off the number two bus in Moseley at 08:30 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>The accused, who cannot be named because of his age, appeared at Birmingham Youth Court.</paragraph></shortFormBody>

69901296.caption: Victim Azim Azam, 16, died in hospital from a single stab wounds

69889729.caption: Azim Azam was found collapsed at the junction between Hayfield Road and Yardley Wood Road

69936256.caption: Victim Azim Azam, 16, died from a single stab wound

results.headline: Teenager remanded over Azim Azam murder in Birmingham
